Enginuity is back for its 2nd edition!

GTI Media is proud to announce that Enginuity is back for its second run. Held in partnership with the NUS Engineering club, it is a platform for NUS Engineering and Information Technology undergraduates and fresh graduates to network with employers, get to know the industry, build key employability skills and discover potential career paths.

Set to take place on 18 March 2020, Wednesday at NUS EA Foyer, 9 Engineering Drive 1, Singapore 117575, we would like to invite YOU to be part of it!
